I.name: Glorious Evolution
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Viktor''' can augment each of his basic [[champion ability|abilities]] at the cost of the maximum 100 ''Hex Fragments'', he obtains them by [[kill]]ing enemies:
* {{tip|Minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} generate 1 ''Hex Fragment''.
* Siege minions, super minions, and epic monsters generate 5 ''Hex Fragments''.
* Enemy {{tip|champion}} {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} generate 25 ''Hex Fragments''.
''{{ai|Chaos Storm|Viktor}}'' becomes augmented once all of '''Viktor's''' basic abilities have been augmented.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Viktor can augment each of his basic champion ability at the cost of the maximum 100 Hex Fragments, he obtains them by killing enemies: * Minions and monsters generate 1 Hex Fragment. * Siege minions, super minions, and epic monsters generate 5 Hex Fragments. * Enemy champion takedowns generate 25 Hex Fragments.
Viktor's Chaos Storm becomes augmented once all of Viktor's basic abilities have been augmented.
I.notes: * Minions shared through {{iis|Relic Shield}} {{nie|Spoils of War}} will generate ''Hex Fragments''.

Q1.name: Siphon Power
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' throws a device at the target enemy that deals {{as|magic damage}}. He also {{tip|shield|shields}} himself for {{pp|27 to 105}} {{as|(+ 18% AP)}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds and gains ''Discharge'' for {{fd|3.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|Discharge:}} '''Viktor's''' next [[basic attack]] becomes {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}} and is modified to deal {{as|magic damage}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Glorious Evolution|Viktor|Augment: Turbocharge}}:}} After the device hits, '''Viktor''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds and the shield's strength is increased by 60%, up to {{pp|30*1.6 to 115*1.6}} {{as|(+ 32% AP)}}.
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viktor throws a device at the target enemy that deals magic damage. He also shields himself for 27 − 105 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) for 2.5 seconds and gains Discharge for 3.5 seconds.
Discharge: Viktor's next basic attack becomes non-projectile and is modified to deal magic damage.
Viktor's Augment: Turbocharge: After the device hits, Viktor gains 30% bonus movement speed for 2.5 seconds and the shield's strength is increased by 60%, up to 30*1.6 − 115*1.6 (based on level) (+ 32% AP).
Q1.notes:
* All damage dealt by {{tip|Spellblade}} on the enhanced attack is converted into {{as|magic damage}}. <!--does not work as of patch 12.11-->
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent '''Viktor''' from gaining ''Discharge''.
* {{tip|Critical strike}} and {{sti|life steal|link=true}} only interact with the basic attack damage component.
* Only the initial projectile can be {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}.
* ''Discharge's'' empowered attack can be {{tip|blocked}} (damage is negated and the empowered attack will still be consumed).
* The empowered attack will trigger but not be consumed nor apply its effects against [[structures]] nor [[ward]]s.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Discharge's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}} and {{tip|blind}}).
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}

effects.str:
• Discharge Damage: (+ 100% AD) (+ 60% AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ 100% AD) (+ 100% AP)

W1.name: Gravity Field
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' deploys a gravity field at the target location for 4 seconds. After a {{fd|0.75}}-second delay, it activates to {{tip|slow}} enemies within, persisting for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the area or generating 3 stacks.

The field inflicts a [[stack]] to enemies within every {{fd|0.5}} seconds, the third stack consumes them all to {{tip|knockdown|knock down}} and {{tip|stun}} the target for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. The target then becomes immune to ''Gravity Field'', occurring once per cast.
{{sbc|{{ai|Glorious Evolution|Viktor|Augment: Magnetize}}:}} '''Viktor's''' other abilities, excluding ''{{ais|Chaos Storm|Viktor}}'' persistent damage, {{tip|slow}} enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.
W1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viktor deploys a gravity field at the target location for 4 seconds. After a 0.75-second delay, it activates to slow enemies within, persisting for 0.25 seconds after leaving the area or generating 3 stacks.
The field inflicts a stack to enemies within every 0.5 seconds, the third stack consumes them all to knock down and stun the target for 1.5 seconds. The target then becomes immune to Gravity Field, occurring once per cast.
Viktor's Augment: Magnetize: Viktor's other abilities, excluding Viktor's Chaos Storm persistent damage, slow enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.
W1.notes:
* ''Gravity Field'' will remain active if '''Viktor''' dies.
* ''Gravity Field's'' animation can be seen by both teams through [[Sight|fog of war]].
* If an enemy enters the area of effect while {{tip|untargetable}}, they may generate stacks even after becoming stunned once, causing them to get stunned up-to 3 times by a single ''Gravity Field''.{{bug}} <!-- Bugged since precisely 11.1-->

E1.name: Death Ray
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' fires an energy beam along the target path that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and briefly grants {{tip|sight}} of the area.
{{sbc|{{ai|Glorious Evolution|Viktor|Augment: Aftershock}}:}} The path explodes along the beam's wake after 1 second, dealing additional {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
E1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viktor fires an energy beam along the target path that deals magic damage to enemies hit and briefly grants sight of the area.
Viktor's Augment: Aftershock: The path explodes along the beam's wake after 1 second, dealing additional magic damage to enemies hit.
leveling: {{st|{{ai|Glorious Evolution|Viktor|Aftershock}} Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 140}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|70+20 to 230+140}} {{as|(+ 130% AP)}}}}
E1.notes:
* '''Viktor''' may freely act while the ray is traveling.
** The effected area is set upon casting, no matter how far away '''Viktor''' moves. Unlike a leash, ''Death Ray'' will not break off its own effect.
* The laser grants a moderate area of {{tip|sight}} around where the beam strikes the ground.
* If ''Death Ray'' is {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}, the initial ray is not destroyed.
** However, the capability to be blocked only applies to the laser as it hits the ground. '''Viktor''' can cast the ability ''over'' the wall and it will not be destroyed or intercepted. 
** ''Augmented Death Ray'' will still cause the entire target area to explode even if the laser is blocked.
* If '''Viktor''' dies while he is firing the beam it only deals damage up to the location at the time of his death.

effects.str:
• Viktor's Aftershock Magic Damage: (+ 80% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 130% AP)

R1.name: Chaos Storm
description:
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' conjures a singularity at the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|disrupt|disrupting}} their {{tip|channel|channeled abilities}}.
The singularity then remains active for {{fd|6.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within it every second and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area. The singularity targets the nearest champion hit by its initial damage and will follow them, moving faster based on its proximity to '''Viktor'''.
''Chaos Storm'' can be recast at any time while the singularity is active.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Viktor''' directs the singularity to the target location or enemy champion.
{{sbc|{{ai|Glorious Evolution|Viktor|Augment: Perfect Storm}}:}} The singularity moves 25% faster.
''Chaos Storm's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}.''
R1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Viktor conjures a singularity at the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and disrupting their channeled abilities.
The singularity then remains active for 6.5 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within it every second and granting sight of the area. The singularity targets the nearest champion hit by its initial damage and will follow them, moving faster based on its proximity to Viktor.
Chaos Storm can be recast at any time while the singularity is active.
Recast: Viktor directs the singularity to the target location or enemy champion.
Viktor's Augment: Perfect Storm: The singularity moves 25% faster.
Chaos Storm's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 250}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
{{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|65 to 145}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|100+65*6 to 250+145*6}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50+45*6}}% AP)}}}}
R1.notes:
* The {{tip|disrupt}} is 'wrapped' into a status effect that says the target is {{tip|Silence|Silenced}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds, but it does not actually ''silence''. It however makes sure that the ''disrupt'' is prevented by {{tip|Cc-immune|immunity to silences}}.
* '''Viktor''' can command the singularity regardless of how far away he is from it. 
* The singularity will remain active even if '''Viktor''' dies. Any commands it was issued prior to his death will not be interrupted.
* ''Chaos Storm'' reaches its maximum speed at 300 units and minimum speed at 900 units away from '''Viktor'''.
* Including the initial damage, ''Chaos Storm'' deals 7 instances of damage.
* The storm will follow its target even if they are not {{tip|sight|visible}}, effectively giving away their position.
* ''Chaos Storm'' can be recast to follow '''Viktor'''. However, upon reaching him, the singularity will stop following '''Viktor'''.
* ''Chaos Storm'' is not obstructed by terrain.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 45% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ % AP)
